description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Gravity can be your best friend or worst enemy in this offbeat action game. Navigate your OTO (Orthographic Traversal Orb) through obstacles and extremely hazardous terrain. Test your solo skills by grabbing all of the gates and braving the gauntlet. Recruit others in a local multiplayer match and decide whether to work together or fight it out for dominance on the perilous journey to the core.
